record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - February 04, 2008)

[Page: S612]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:49 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, February 5, 2008, at 10 a.m.
